
# Papers to Read

```{r, echo = FALSE}

df <- readr::read_csv("paper_list.csv")
knitr::kable(df)

```

Please do *not* edit `README.md`. To add a paper to this table, please add it 
to `paper_list.csv` and run the `compile_readme.R` script.
